alert.note: Alert for Guam (Guam) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 27 at 2:32AM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 AM CHST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Southern Guam, south of cross island road. * WHEN...Until 330 AM ChST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 231 AM ChST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Rapid river rises will cause minor flooding in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Talofofo, Inarajan, Merizo and Umatac. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
